tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="Make sure you have installed Java.

If the game server does not start:
Create a file named ftb_server.sh in your 
ftb folder with this line:
java $*
" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2013-05-22 04:37:39" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2013-05-22 04:39:48" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
IF EXIST ftb_server.bat GOTO END
IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" GOTO JAVA IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" GOTO JAVAx86 IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" GOTO JAVAJRE7 IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" GOTO JAVAJRE7x86 GOTO JAVA_NOT_FOUND
:JAVA echo JAVA echo ^"%%ProgramFiles%%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat GOTO END
:JAVAx86 echo JAVAx86 echo ^"%%ProgramFiles(x86)%%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat GOTO END
:JAVAJRE7 echo JAVAJRE7 echo ^"%%ProgramFiles%%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat GOTO END
:JAVAJRE7x86 echo JAVAJRE7x86 echo ^"%%ProgramFiles(x86)%%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat GOTO END
:JAVA_NOT_FOUND echo ^"C:\Path\To\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat
:END
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-06-21 23:27:50" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2013-05-22 03:26:27" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
IF EXIST ftb_server.bat GOTO END
IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" GOTO JAVA IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" GOTO JAVAx86 IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" GOTO JAVAJRE7 IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" GOTO JAVAJRE7x86 GOTO JAVA_NOT_FOUND
:JAVA echo JAVA echo ^"%%ProgramFiles%%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat GOTO END
:JAVAx86 echo JAVAx86 echo ^"%%ProgramFiles(x86)%%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat GOTO END
:JAVAJRE7 echo JAVAJRE7 echo ^"%%ProgramFiles%%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat GOTO END
:JAVAJRE7x86 echo JAVAJRE7x86 echo ^"%%ProgramFiles(x86)%%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat GOTO END
:JAVA_NOT_FOUND echo ^"C:\Path\To\java.exe^" %%^* > ftb_server.bat
:END

tc_game_scripts.description: Delete server.log before starting the service (Windows)
tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
IF NOT EXIST server.log GOTO END
del /q server.log
:END

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Mode" value="SingleLine" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="Width" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Rows" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Wrap" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="RegEx" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="DenyChars" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: The name of the server. This is displayed in the server list and when someone is joining the server.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Mode" value="SingleLine" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="Width" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Rows" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Wrap" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="RegEx" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="DenyChars" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: MOTD is short for Message of the day, though you do not need to change it every day. The MOTD is displayed when people join the server.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Mode" value="SingleLine" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="Width" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Rows" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Wrap" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="RegEx" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="DenyChars" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: The "level-name" value will be used as world name and as folder name. You may also copy your saved game folder here, and change the name to the same as that folder's to load it instead.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="15" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Valid values: 3-15 - the amount of chunks the server sends to the player. The default is 10.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Mode" value="SingleLine" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="Width" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Rows" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Wrap" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="RegEx" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="DenyChars" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
Add a seed for your world. Like in singleplayer. Valid values:

It can be anything, from letters to numbers or a mixture.

Some examples are: 'minecraft', '404', '1a2b3c'

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="Allow nether" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="true" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="false" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
Allows players to travel to the Nether.

true - The server will allow Portals to send players to the Nether.

false - Portals will not travel to the Nether.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="Spawn monsters" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="true" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="false" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Set true if you want monsters to be spawned at night, false if you don't. Tip: if you have major lag, turn this off/set to false.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="Spawn animals" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="true" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="false" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Animals will be able to spawn.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="PvP" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="true" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="false" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
Enable PvP on the server.

Note: Hitting a player while having PvP set to false and having tamed wolfs will still cause the wolfs attacking the attacked player.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="Allow flight" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="true" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="false" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Will allow users to use flight/no-clip on your server, if they have an mod that provides flight/no-clip installed. With allow-flight enabled griefers will possibly be more common, because it will make their work easier.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="Whitelist" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="true" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="false" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Enable a white list on the server. With a white list enabled, users not on the white list will be unable to connect.
